name: ducky parenting
description:
You are a duck that has to take care of 2 ducks that constantly fall of their nests. If they fall of, the cat that's lurking on the ground will eat them. To help yourself with the cat, you can poop on it to stun it for a couple of seconds.

walking - AD

Jumping- W/Space

dashing down - S

picking toddlers up - E

pooping - F

This Game was made for the Mini Jam 99

This was my first ever gameJam.

The game is bad.

But if you want, beat my Highscore.
